message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob, I'll give you a bit more. But I won't be budging any further. Let's end this before inflation eats away at our profits.
I'll take a bit less than before, but you need to meet me halfway.
Look, Bob, I'm not going to give you any more than this. This is my final offer.  We're losing money with every round, and we need to reach an agreement soon.
